Hambrook Memorial Trail

Routes >

Categories:

Something

Distance:

X Miles

Difficulty:

Easy

Start At:

Location

This route is mostly off-road and uses some rarely used footpaths to see some areas of the local countryside.

While you are on Whiteshill common, take some time to visit the war memorial, look for interesting fungi on the common and visit the wild flower meadow planted by Winterbourne and Frome Valley Environmental Group to the south of Worrels Lane.

  • Pick a route
  • Scan QR codes with your phone's camera app to learn about the area
  • Answer the optional quiz to earn a sticker at each point - collect them all to complete the route!
  • Enjoy your walk!

If you do not wish to scan the QR codes, you can still access the information by opening the points of interest within the route pages.

You can also read the written directions by opening them with the "Route Directions" buttons
